### Steps to reproduce the behavior

#### OS version (Win/Mac/\*Nix?)

#### Dotnet version

```bash
dotnet --info
```

#### NodeJS version
```
node --version
```


#### Yeoman version
```
yo --version
```


#### Generator version
NPM 3.*:
```
npm list -g generator-aspnet
```
NPM 2.*:
```
npm ls generator-aspnet -ls=0 --long
```
